doc:
"Lucy Griffiths (actress born 1986)" 0 Lucy Ursula Griffiths (born 10 October 1986) is an English actress best known for her roles as Lady Marian in the BBC drama series Robin Hood (2006–09), as Nora Gainesborough, Eric Northman's vampire "sister", in the HBO horror series True Blood (2012–13) and as Emily Woodrow in the AMC supernatural drama series Preacher (2016–present). Lucy_Ursula_Griffiths ( born_10_October_1986 ) is an_English_actress best_known for her_roles as Lady_Marian in the_BBC_drama_series_Robin_Hood ( 2006 – 09 ) , as Nora_Gainesborough , Eric_Northman 's_vampire_"_sister_" , in the_HBO_horror_series_True_Blood ( 2012 – 13 ) and as Emily_Woodrow in the_AMC_supernatural_drama_series_Preacher ( 2016 – present ) .
